name: Avenger Madness
description:
Wrrerlcome to Avenger Madness, the game where you play as your favourite Avengers! This is a collab between:

@Kitty-cat-splat and @LachieAndMalachie 

with help from:

@Game_boyproductions, @LittleTheRabbit and @Weep_Gaming.

To Save click [Z] and to Load click [Y] 

Controls:

Hulk

-Radiation Bubble [R]

-Multi-Jump HOLD Up Arrow

-Punch [F]

Spidercat

-Agility [Active]

-Web Slash [W]

-Web Sling [S]

Captain America

-Ride Shield [Double Click Space]

-Throw Shield [T]

-Block to the right [B]

Iron Cat

-Repulsor Plasma [R]

-Missiles [M]

-Unibeam [U]

-Flight [Double Tap Space]

Thanks for playing
